feed.title: Elk Island (National Park) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: FOG ADVISORY ENDED, Elk Island (National Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:50 p.m. MDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 3.1Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Elk Island National Park 2:00 PM MDT Saturday 1 April 2023
Temperature: 3.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 62 %
Dewpoint: -3.5°C
Wind: WSW 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 4

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries near noon. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 4 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Saturday 1 April 2023
